Can I ask a question?I think I have a PSP 1000 so it won't work.Is it possible to make it PSP 2000???

LOL, PSP 1000 or 2000 is the model... you have to use a Custom Firmware like 5.50 GEN-D (Full) and it will work with no problem... It's like it have the 9.99 firmware... :P

If you have some trouble like black screen, for example, while using 5.50 GEN-D (Full), you have to deactivate the KBBS Plugins...

to play this game 
1. Put it on your psp WITH custom firmware in the iso folder

2. if you have the patch file DEACTIVATE IT Hold the right trigger on start up (if it doesn't work HOLD the power button up till the screen turns off and try again) go to the plugins option and deactivate the BBS patch. (also i would deactivate any other plugins that have the [game] at the end to prevent glitches)

3. go into your games and click on the game and play, that's its

Note this is the installed data so you cant install again its fast enough loading like 1 to 2 sec loading what more can you ask for? lol
